item.title: Shield Wall: Resupply Attacker has laundered 2280 ETH through Tornado Cash
item.description: Update: On August 12th, as per PeckShield's monitoring, the Resupply attacker has managed to launder 2280 ETH (valued approximately at $9.8 million) by means of Tornado Cash.

item.title: Binance Wallet Exclusive TGE Launch of Cherry AI (AIBOT)
item.description: August 12th. According to official information, Binance Wallet hosted the 33rd exclusive TGE with Cherry AI (AIBOT).· Subscription Period: From 4:00 PM to 6:00 PM on August 14th, 2025 (UTC+8).· Subscription Qualification: Eligible users need to participate by using Alpha Points.An additional 30,000,000 AIBOT will be set aside for future events, and the specific details will be announced later.

item.title: Analyst: When BTC drops ahead of CPI or PPI data release, it typically sees a quick rebound post-data.
item.description: On August 12th, cryptocurrency analyst @ali_charts presented a chart analysis indicating that when BTC declines prior to the release of CPI or PPI data, it generally experiences a rapid rebound after the data is made public, and vice versa.

item.title: Or 3 addresses belonging to the same whale staked 14,942 ETH and deposited it into Binance
item.description: On August 12th, as monitored by LookOnChain, within the past hour, three addresses (which are likely to belong to the same whale) unbonded 14,942 ETH ($64.38 million) and deposited it into Binance.

item.title: A whale withdrew 500 BTC from Binance 1 hour ago and currently holds a total of 3,000 BTC.
item.description: On August 12th, according to Arkham Monitoring, a whale withdrew 500 BTC from Binance one hour ago. Currently, this address holds a total of 3,000 BTC, which is worth $356 million.

item.title: Arthur Hayes has accumulated a total of $9.81 million worth of ETH-based tokens in the past two days, currently realizing a $180,000 unrealized gain.
item.description: On August 12th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), following the establishment of a new position, Arthur Hayes, the co-founder of BitMEX, has accumulated ETH ecosystem tokens worth $9.801 million in the past two days. Currently, he has an unrealized gain of $180,000.

item.title: Whale AguilaTrades's ETH long position has increased to 10,000 ETH, equivalent to around $43.07 million
item.description: On August 12th, based on the monitoring of on-chain analyst Yu Jin, whale AguilaTrades has currently established a long position of 10,000 ETH. The value of this position is $43.07 million. The entry price is $4,318, and the liquidation price is $3,852.

item.title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holders Accumulate Over 220,000 BTC Since June 21
item.description: On August 12th, according to Glassnode data, starting from June 21st, short-term holders (investors who have held Bitcoin for less than 155 days) have increased their holdings by more than 220,000 BTC (+9.9%). Although this growth is significant, it is still relatively moderate when compared to the period from January to March of this year. During that time, the supply held by short-term holders witnessed a surge of 540,000 BTC (+25%) in one of the most intense rotations within this cycle.

item.title: Analysis: Bitcoin's uptrend may be nearing an early end, with the price target potentially falling to $95,000
item.description: August 12th. As per Cointelegraph, the upward trajectory of Bitcoin is at risk of coming to an early end. The market is showing a target price expectation below $100,000. The latest market analysis released by traders like ZAYK Charts on Tuesday cautioned that Bitcoin is currently in a continuous "Distribution Phase."ZAYK Charts thinks that Bitcoin may drop to $95,000, a level that has not been reached since early May. BTC previously went through the classic "Mark-Up" phase from a long-term low rebound and has now entered the "Distribution" phase, which is typically a reversal zone of an uptrend.Since last November, the $92,000 to $95,000 range has had a significant impact on Bitcoin's price movement, serving as both support and resistance levels during intense market volatility.Trader Mikybull Crypto characterized this week's Bitcoin breakthrough above $122,000 followed by a pullback as "ugly." He stated that BTC has re-entered its previous range-bound action, with altcoins bein

item.title: Within one week of the implementation of the Hong Kong Stablecoin Regulation, the size of the local OTC trading market has decreased by approximately 32.94%.
item.description: On August 12th, as per Bitrace's monitoring, within a week after the implementation of the Hong Kong stablecoin regulations, the local OTC market size has witnessed a reduction of approximately 32.94%. The daily average USDT transfer volume of the business addresses of storefront service providers has dropped by 43.20% (from 9.47 million to 5.38 million), while that of the business addresses of non-storefront service providers has decreased by 30.65% (from 42.57 million to 29.52 million).
